languages.text: "Император возложил бремя на нас, ибо посчитал, что мы справимся. Сейчас ты сомневаешься в себе, но не в Лекс Империалис. Отвечай, я прав{mf||а}"?
"The Emperor laid this burden upon us in the certainty that we were equal to it. Now you are doubting yourself, but not the Lex Imperialis. Tell me — am I right?"
languages.original_text: "Император возложил бремя на нас, ибо посчитал, что мы справимся. Сейчас ты сомневаешься в себе, но не в Лекс Империалис. Отвечай, я прав{mf||а}"?

traits.locale_text: "The Emperor laid this burden upon us in the certainty that we were equal to it. Now you are doubting yourself, but not the Lex Imperialis. Tell me — am I right?"
"The Emperor laid this burden upon us in the certainty that we were equal to it. Now you are doubting yourself, but not the Lex Imperialis. Tell me — am I right?"
"The Emperor laid this burden upon us in the certainty that we were equal to it. Now you are doubting yourself, but not the Lex Imperialis. Tell me — am I right?"
"The Emperor laid this burden upon us in the certainty that we were equal to it. Now you are doubting yourself, but not the Lex Imperialis. Tell me — am I right?"
"The Emperor laid this burden upon us in the certainty that we were equal to it. Now you are doubting yourself, but not the Lex Imperialis. Tell me — am I right?"

languages.text: 「皇帝陛下は、{mf|俺|私}たちが耐えられると確信して、この重荷を与えた。今、君は自分自身を疑っているが、レックス・インペリアを疑っているわけではない。{mf|俺|私}の言っていることはあっているか？」
languages.original_text: "The Emperor laid this burden upon us in the certainty that we were equal to it. Now you are doubting yourself, but not the Lex Imperialis. Tell me — am I right?"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝陛下は、{mf|俺|私}たちが耐えられると確信して、この重荷を与えた。今、君は自分自身を疑っているが、レックス・インペリアを疑っているわけではない。{mf|俺|私}の言っていることはあっているか？」

languages.text: "Der Imperator hat uns diese Bürde in der Gewissheit auferlegt, dass wir ihr gewachsen sind. Nun zweifelt Ihr an Euch selbst, aber nicht am Lex Imperia. Sagt mir, ob ich recht habe."
languages.original_text: "The Emperor laid this burden upon us in the certainty that we were equal to it. Now you are doubting yourself, but not the Lex Imperialis. Tell me — am I right?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Imperator hat uns diese Bürde in der Gewissheit auferlegt, dass wir ihr gewachsen sind. Nun zweifelt Ihr an Euch selbst, aber nicht am Lex Imperia. Sagt mir, ob ich recht habe."

languages.text: « L'Empereur nous a confié ce fardeau, car Il savait que nous serions en mesure de le porter. Vous doutez de vous, mais pas de la Lex Imperialis. N'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "The Emperor laid this burden upon us in the certainty that we were equal to it. Now you are doubting yourself, but not the Lex Imperialis. Tell me — am I right?"

traits.locale_text: « L'Empereur nous a confié ce fardeau, car Il savait que nous serions en mesure de le porter. Vous doutez de vous, mais pas de la Lex Imperialis. N'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: «El Emperador nos encomendó esta carga porque sabía que estaríamos a la altura de las circunstancias. Ahora duda usted de sí mismo, pero seguro que no de la Lex Imperialis. Dígame si me equivoco».
languages.original_text: "The Emperor laid this burden upon us in the certainty that we were equal to it. Now you are doubting yourself, but not the Lex Imperialis. Tell me — am I right?"

traits.locale_text: «El Emperador nos encomendó esta carga porque sabía que estaríamos a la altura de las circunstancias. Ahora duda usted de sí mismo, pero seguro que no de la Lex Imperialis. Dígame si me equivoco».

languages.text: “帝皇将这个重担交给了我们，是因为祂确信我们一定能够胜任。你现在怀疑的并不是帝国法典，而是你自己。告诉我，我说得对吗？”
languages.original_text: "The Emperor laid this burden upon us in the certainty that we were equal to it. Now you are doubting yourself, but not the Lex Imperialis. Tell me — am I right?"

traits.locale_text: “帝皇将这个重担交给了我们，是因为祂确信我们一定能够胜任。你现在怀疑的并不是帝国法典，而是你自己。告诉我，我说得对吗？”

languages.text: "İmparator, bu yükü bize altından kalkabileceğimizin bilinciyle yükledi. Sense şu an Lex İmperialis'ten değil, kendinden şüphe ediyorsun. Söyle, haklı mıyım?"
languages.original_text: "The Emperor laid this burden upon us in the certainty that we were equal to it. Now you are doubting yourself, but not the Lex Imperialis. Tell me — am I right?"

traits.locale_text: "İmparator bu yükü bize altından kalkabileceğimiz bilinciyle yükledi. Sense şu an Lex İmperialis'ten değil ancak kendinden şüphe ediyorsun. Söyle, haklı mıyım?"
